channel.title: Oblivion - need creative minded dialogue writers!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://images.wikia.com/kolidascope/images/e/e0/Dancing_goblin_girl_wow.gif[/img][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2yngz89.png[/img][img]http://images.wikia.com/kolidascope/images/e/e0/Dancing_goblin_girl_wow.gif[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2rgdtad.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/flya9e.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=verdana][size=14pt]We are currently looking for creative minded people who're able to create new, original and innovative ideas. You might wonder why we exactly need 'creative minded' people, now I will explain it to you: The most servers now a days really focusses on perfecting everything just like RuneScape did. Of course there are a few exceptions, take for example Arham his awesome world 901 concept. Our team just had this feeling that something was missing in private servers, the storyline. Everyone is so busy perfecting every skill etc.. that they completely forgotten about the storyline. So this is going to be the main idea in Oblivion, we really focus on the storyline and try to give everyone this 'I am a hero' feeling. For more information about this you should visit our development thread,[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,651846.msg4369507.html#msg4369507]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,651846.msg4369507.html#msg4369507[/url].
writer requirements: - good english grammar - creative mind
Modeler Requirements: I dont know much about modeling but just show your work and we will discuss it :) [/size][/font][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/28k661v.png[/img][/center]

I’ll pm you references, past work, servers, and other information upon request.[/quote]Well beta testers are well received

item.title: Oblivion - need creative minded dialogue writers!
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:3, topic:533150”][quote author=Docent link=topic=651940.msg4370058#msg4370058 date=1380418502]
I’d sign up if I was able to get a Skype or something.

By the way is you server based on TES IV Oblivion?
[/quote]

No idea what that is, but I’ve got my skype in my description:
Stan.van.der.bend

Add me, than when Lare and Arturo gets on we’ll discuss about it
Thanks you for your interest.[/quote]It was originally based on it, the first oblivion we made, was having a main storyline where you started on tha jaill and that stuff, i could link you to the old development if you wish, but this time, we just kept the name

Read full topic

item.title: Oblivion - need creative minded dialogue writers!
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:3, topic:533150”][quote author=Docent link=topic=651940.msg4370058#msg4370058 date=1380418502]
I’d sign up if I was able to get a Skype or something.

By the way is you server based on TES IV Oblivion?
[/quote]

No idea what that is, but I’ve got my skype in my description:
Stan.van.der.bend

Add me, than when Lare and Arturo gets on we’ll discuss about it
Thanks you for your interest.[/quote]

Well by “if I was able to get a Skype” i meant that I can’t get one. I see how you misunderstood. And TES IV Oblivion is the Elder Scrolls before Skyrim.

Read full topic

item.title: Oblivion - need creative minded dialogue writers!
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

[center]

2yngz89.png800×200
[/center]

[center]

2rgdtad.png1001×56
[/center]

[center]

flya9e.png1001×168
[/center]

[center][font=verdana][size=14pt]We are currently looking for creative minded people who’re able to create new, original and innovative ideas.
You might wonder why we exactly need ‘creative minded’ people, now I will explain it to you:
The most servers now a days really focusses on perfecting everything just like RuneScape did.
Of course there are a few exceptions, take for example Arham his awesome world 901 concept.
Our team just had this feeling that something was missing in private servers, the storyline.
Everyone is so busy perfecting every skill etc… that they completely forgotten about the storyline.
So this is going to be the main idea in Oblivion, we really focus on the storyline and try to give everyone this
‘I am a hero’ feeling. For more information about this you should visit our development thread,http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,651846.msg4369507.html#msg4369507.

writer requirements:

  • good english grammar
  • creative mind

Modeler Requirements:
I dont know much about modeling but just show your work
and we will discuss it
[/size][/font][/center]

[center][/center]

Read full topic
